title: Ex-Lazard Banker’s Insider Tips Reaped $41 Million, US Says
description: A former dealmaker at Lazard Ltd., one of Wall Street’s most prominent investment banks, is accused by US authorities of feeding tips on health-care deals to a friend’s network of insider traders, who generated $41 million of illicit profits.
content: A former dealmaker at Lazard Ltd., one of Wall Street’s most prominent investment banks, is accused by US authorities of feeding tips on health-care deals to a friend’s network of insider traders, who generated $41 million of illicit profits.
